summary: An email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting a brief meeting to discuss updates on the Epstein case, indicating ongoing legal activity and coordination among prosecutors in April 2019.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, requesting a meeting to discuss updates on the Epstein case.

events.title: Prosecutor Meeting Request on Epstein
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests a 5-10 minute meeting with colleagues to run through updates on the Epstein case.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 3, 2019, regarding the Epstein case.
The sender is an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates ongoing prosecutorial activity and coordination on the Epstein case in early 2019.
The tone suggests routine, non-emergency updates were being discussed among legal team members.
